name: many-notes
description: Many Notes is a plain-text, Markdown-based note-taking platform with a focus on full control and simplicity. It allows organizing notes into folders with tags and supports self-hosted syncing and search.
features: Markdown editing: Write notes in plain Markdown with syntax highlighting and preview.
Folder organization: Structure notes in a hierarchical folder system for logical grouping.
Tag support: Apply tags to notes for cross-folder organization and quick filtering.
Full-text search: Search across all notes by content, title, or tags instantly.
Sync capability: Synchronize notes across devices using your own server or cloud storage.
File-based storage: Notes stored as plain text files for easy backup and portability.
Version control: Integrate with Git for automatic versioning and change tracking.
Attachment handling: Link to external files or embed images within notes.
Keyboard navigation: Navigate and edit notes efficiently with keyboard shortcuts.
Export options: Export individual notes or entire collections in various formats.
Privacy focused: Complete control over your data with self-hosted deployment.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements make it fast and responsive on any device.
